awd_titl_txt: CONAcYT: Texas A&M University - UNAM Two-Way Video Infrastructure
awd_abstract_narration:
This project proposes to develop an application delivery system, in collaboration with the Universidad Nacional Autonoma de Mexico (UNAM), which will provide real-time distance learning opportunities.  This system will be created by:

(1)	Establishing a high-speed, high-bandwidth Internet2 gateway at the Texas A&M University (TAMU) Center at UNAM
(2)	Connecting the Texas A&M University Virtual Networking Lab to the gateway
(3)	Linking distance learning studios at Texas A&M University and UNAM

The user population for the project is as diverse as the institution's populations and includes:

(1)	Texas A&M University Educational Broadcasting Services
(2)	Texas A&M University Architecture Study Abroad students and faculty
(3)	Texas A&M University Latin American Study Program
(4)	Texas A&M University Chemistry Department
(5)	DGSCA-UNAM
(6)	Mexican students in U.S. continuing education programs
(7)	Mexican networking students and personnel needing hands-on continuing networking education.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Computer and Information Science and Engineering
org_div_long_name: Division Of Computer and Network Systems
